title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of university applicants, with a total of 9 data points.
Overall Number of university applicants has decreased over the Year
Number of university applicants is roughly constant from 2010 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
Max Number of university applicants about 674890.0 was recorded at Year 2016
Min Number of university applicants about 616700.0 was recorded at Year 2012
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of university applicants, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2012 to 2016.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2018.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2010 to 2012.
